description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for Booking entities, providing methods to find bookings by user or driver ID, and to count bookings by driver ID and status.

classes.name: BookingRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for managing Booking entities, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and custom queries.

methods.name: findByUser_Id
methods.description: Finds a list of bookings associated with a specific user ID.

methods.name: findByDriver_Id
methods.description: Finds a list of bookings associated with a specific driver ID.

methods.name: countByDriver_IdAndStatusIn
methods.description: Counts the number of bookings for a specific driver ID with statuses in the provided list.
